governorates.name: Giza
governorates.description: Giza Governorate is located on the western bank of the Nile River, opposite Cairo Governorate. It combines urban and rural characteristics, ancient history, and modern development.
tourist_places: The Three Pyramids and the Sphinx
The Saqqara area (Step Pyramid of Djoser)

activities.title: Camel Riding
activities.description: Enjoy camel riding at the pyramids, a fun and wonderful experience recommended for all visitors.

activities.title: Horseback Riding
activities.description: Try horseback riding at the Giza Pyramids and enjoy the scenic beauty and fresh air.

activities.title: Horse-drawn Carriage Ride
activities.description: Tourists enjoy horse-drawn carriage rides around Giza’s streets and tourist areas, including the Nile Corniche.

governorates.name: Aswan
governorates.description: Aswan is known for its natural beauty, Nubian culture, and ancient temples. It’s a key destination for tourists worldwide.

activities.title: Sand Therapy
activities.description: Hot sand immersion therapy on Elephantine Island is used to treat ailments like rheumatism and joint diseases.

activities.title: Boat Ride on the Nile
activities.description: Ride a boat along the Nile and enjoy the stunning natural views of Egypt.

activities.title: Visit the Botanical Gardens
activities.description: Botanical Island is a beautiful natural site in the middle of the Nile River, rich with plant species.

activities.title: Aswan Market
activities.description: A lively market offering spices, Nubian crafts, perfumes, and souvenirs.

governorates.name: Fayoum
governorates.description: Fayoum is known for its deserts, natural reserves, and adventure tourism.

activities.title: Exploring Natural Sites
activities.description: Visit Wadi El-Rayan waterfalls, lakes, and Wadi Al-Hitan’s whale fossils.

activities.title: Desert Camping
activities.description: Adventure camping under starry skies in Wadi El-Rayan and Wadi Al-Hitan.

activities.title: Sand Skating
activities.description: Sandboarding in Wadi El-Rayan is one of the best sports experiences in Fayoum.
